question.title: Compilation Date
NOTE: If you are filling this in on behalf of someone else, please answer all the questions as if you are that person
Have you had any of the following symptoms since your last visit (or in the past weeks, if this is your first visit)?
question.description: Why are we asking this? The key part of this survey is tracking people’s symptoms. How should I answer it? For people with chronic (long-term) illnesses, only tick changes in symptoms. So, if you have chronic shortness of breath (for instance) then only tick this box if this has got worse recently.

question.title: On your last visit, you reported that you were still ill. Are the symptoms you report today part of the same bout of illness?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To make filling out the rest of the survey quicker for you. How should I answer it? If you believe that the symptoms you have reported today are caused by the same bout of illness as your previous symptoms, please tick “yes”. To save you time, we have filled in the information you gave us previously about your illness. Please check that it is still correct, and make any changes – for instance, if you have visited a doctor or taken additional time off work since you last completed the survey.

question.title: NOTE
question.description: To save you time, we have filled in the information you gave us previously about your illness. Please check that it is still correct, and make any changes – for instance, if you have visited a doctor or taken additional time off work since you last completed the survey.

question.title: When did the first symptoms appear?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To help us work out the number of cases of flu that arise each day. How should I answer it? Please give as accurate an estimate as possible.

question.title: When did your symptoms end?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Using the beginning and end dates of symptoms we can work out how long respiratory infections last. How should I answer it? Please give as accurate an estimate as possible.

question.title: Did your symptoms develop suddenly over a few hours?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Sudden onset of symptoms is believed to be common for flu. How should I answer it? Tick yes if your symptoms appeared over a few hours rather than gradually developing over a few days.

question.title: When did your fever begin?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Fever is very important for diagnosing flu, so we want to know when this started. How should I answer it? Please give as accurate an estimate as possible.

question.title: Did your fever develop suddenly over a few hours?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Flu is often associated with a sudden onset of fever How should I answer it? Tick yes if your fever appeared over a few hours rather than gradually developing over a few days.

question.title: Did you take your temperature?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Flu often causes a high temperature. However, not everyone takes their temperature when they are ill. How should I answer it? Answer yes, if you took your temperature using a thermometer.

question.title: What was your highest temperature measured?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Flu often causes a high temperature. How should I answer it? Give the highest temperature you recorded during this episode of illness.

question.title: Because of your symptoms, did you VISIT (see face to face) any medical services?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To find out whether people contact the health services because of their symptoms. How should I answer it? Tick all of those that apply. If you are due to see attend, then tick the final option.

option.text: Hospital accident & emergency department / out of hours service
No, but I have an appointment scheduled

question.title: How soon after your symptoms appeared did you first VISIT a medical service?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To find out how quickly people with symptoms are seen by the health services. How should I answer it? Only record the time until your FIRST contact with the health services.

row.title: Hospital accident & department/out of hours service

question.title: Because of your symptoms, did you contact via TELEPHONE or INTERNET any of medical services?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To find out whether people contact the health services because of their symptoms. How should I answer it? Tick all options that apply

option.text: GP - spoke to doctor or nurse

question.title: How soon after your symptoms appeared did you first contact a medical service via TELEPHONE or INTERNET?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To find out how quickly people with symptoms contact the health services. How should I answer it? Only record the time until your FIRST contact with the health services.

row.title: GP – spoke to doctor or nurse

question.title: Did you take medication for these symptoms (tick all that apply)?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To find out who gets treated, and how effective treatment is. How should I answer it? Only record those medications that you used because of this bout of illness. If you are on other medications because of a pre-existing illness then do not record these.

option.text: Pain killers (e.g. paracetamol, lemsip, ibuprofen, aspirin, calpol, etc)

question.title: How long after the beginning of your symptoms did you start taking antiviral medication?
question.description: Why are we asking this? Antivirals are thought to be most effective if taken quickly after disease onset. How should I answer it? Report the time until you first started taking antivirals (which may not be the same day as you got your prescription).

question.title: Did you change your daily routine because of your illness?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To measure how people’s daily lives are affected by their symptoms. How should I answer it? We want to know if you were absent from work or school as a result of your illness, or if you changed your routine in other ways (e.g. stopped attending clubs).

option.text: Yes, but I did not take time off work/school
Yes, I took time off work/school

question.title: Are you still off work/school?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To estimate the average amount of time that people take off work, we need to know if people are still off work. How should I answer it? Tick “yes” if you would be at work/school today if you were not currently ill.

option.text: Other (e.g. I wouldn’t usually be at work/school today anyway)

question.title: How long have you been off work/school?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To measure the effect of symptoms on people’s daily lives. How should I answer it? Only count the days that you normally would have been in school or work (e.g. don’t count weekends).

question.title: What do you think is causing your symptoms?
question.description: Why are we asking this? To help find out if our assessment of your illness based on your symptoms matches what you believe to be the cause. You might have a better idea of what is causing your illness than our computer algorithms. How should I answer it? If you are reasonably sure about what is causing your symptoms, please tick the appropriate box. Otherwise, please tick “I don’t know”.

question.title: Heeft u sinds uw vorige bezoek (of sinds afgelopen week als dit de eerste keer is dat u inlogt) last gehad van een of meer van de onderstaande symptomen?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Heeft u bij uw vorige bezoek gemeld dat u ziek was?
question.description: Zo ja, worden de huidige symptomen nog steeds veroorzaakt door dezelfde ziekte?

question.title: N.B.
question.description: Indien u nog steeds ziek bent, hebben we de informatie die u ons de vorige keer gaf alvast voor u ingevuld. Controleert u deze alstublieft en corrigeert u deze indien nodig - als u bijvoorbeeld de huisarts hebt bezocht of sinds uw vorige meting extra dagen ziekteverlof hebt opgenomen.

question.title: Wanneer kwamen de eerste symptomen opzetten?
Wanneer namen de symptomen af?
Kwamen de symptomen plotseling binnen een paar uur opzetten?
Wanneer kwam de koorts opzetten?
Kwam de koorts plotseling binnen een paar uur opzetten?
Heeft u uw temperatuur gemeten?
Wat was uw hoogst gemeten temperatuur?
Heeft u medische hulp gezocht vanwege uw symptomen? En zo ja, waar?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Heeft u vanwege uw symptomen telefonisch of via internet contact gezocht met instanties? En zo ja, welke?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Heeft u vanwege uw symptomen medicijnen gebruikt? En zo ja, welke?
question.description: (Meerdere antwoorden mogelijk.)

question.title: Hoe snel nadat uw symptomen opkwamen bent u begonnen met het gebruik van antivirale middelen?
Heeft u vanwege uw symptomen uw dagelijkse bezigheden moeten aanpassen?
Bent u vandaag nog steeds ziek thuis?
Hoe lang bent u niet naar werk/school geweest?
Heeft u zelf enig idee waar uw klachten vandaan komen?

option.text: Ja, bij de eerste hulp van het ziekenhuis of de huisartsenpost
Ja, ik ben opgenomen in het ziekenhuis
Ja, ik heb andere medische hulp gezocht
Nog niet, maar ik heb wel een afspraak gemaakt
Ja, ik heb mijn huisarts gebeld en heb alleen de assistente gesproken
Ja, ik heb mijn huisarts gebeld en heb met een dokter of verpleegkundige gesproken
Ja, ik heb contact gezocht met het Nivel (Nederlands instituut voor onderzoek van de gezondheidszorg)
Ja, ik heb contact gezocht met het RIVM (Rijksinstituut voor Volksgezondheid en Milieu)
Ja, ik heb contact gezocht met andere instanties.
Nee, ik heb geen medicijnen gebruikt
Ja, pijnstillers zoals paracetamol, aspirine of ibuprofen
Ja, medicijnen om het hoesten te onderdrukken
Ja, antivirale middelen zoals Tamiflu of Relenza
Dezelfde dag (binnen 24 uur na opkomen van de eerste symptomen)
Ja, maar ik ben wel gewoon naar werk/school gegaan
Ja, ik ben thuis gebleven terwijl ik eigenlijk naar werk/school had gemoeten
Ik had vandaag sowieso niet naar werk/school gehoeven
Ja, ik heb griep of griepachtige verschijnselen
Ja, van een allergie zoals hooikoorts
Ja, ik heb maag-darmklachten of buikgriep
Ja, ik heb een andere ziekte die de klachten veroorzaakt
